name: Live Empire 2
description:
‘Live Empire 2’ is a simulated cultivation game.

Sign a platform and start live broadcast

Let the anchor enhance his reputation through live broadcast, sign a better platform and gain more profits.

Cultivate attributes to improve live broadcast effect

Training anchors and improving attributes will play a bonus role in different live broadcasts, making your income from each live broadcast greater!

Enhance goodwill through dating

What should you do after earning money? Of course, it’s a date with your favorite girl. Dating more will improve her goodwill, unlock more dating places and trigger hidden plots. More surprises are waiting for you to discover!

Dressing at will

Another advantage of improving goodwill is that more clothes can be unlocked, which can be changed on the live broadcast or on the date.
